participant_1.background:
I love my dog, but I'm a bit of a loner.
I'm not sure my parents would approve of my music hobby, but it's something that I love and it helps me to relax.
I enjoy rock music, especially Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park.

participant_2.background:
My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.
i really enjoy reading the news.
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
I like to dye my hair a bright shade of red.
I have a date with my girlfriend tonight after a long run.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
Pretty good, thanks! Just finishing up a run. How about you?
Doing well, thanks! Just got back from the dog park with my pup.
Oh, what kind of dog do you have?
He's a pug named Corky. He's a total sweetheart.
Awww, pugs are so cute! I love their little faces.
Yeah, they're pretty great. How long have you been running for?
I've been running on and off for a few years now. I'm really getting into it lately, though.
That's awesome! I've been trying to get into running more myself, but it's hard to find the time.
Yeah, it can be tough to fit it in, but it's so worth it.
I know, I know. I'll keep trying!
Good luck! I'm sure you'll get there.
Thanks! What do you do for fun at home?
I like to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family.
Oh, that sounds nice. I like to read and watch movies too.
Do you have any favorite books or movies?
I love the Harry Potter series and the Lord of the Rings movies.
Oh, I love those too! I'm a huge fan of fantasy.
Me too! It's so much fun to get lost in another world.
Absolutely! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! We should talk more sometime.
That sounds great! I'd love to
